name: Alien Protection
description:
In this exciting game, you become a brave space traveler who finds himself on an alien planet after your spaceship breaks down. Your survival skills are put to the test as you fight off waves of extraterrestrial attacks. The ultimate goal is to survive as long as possible by shooting down as many aliens as possible.

Each successful kill earns you money that you can use to upgrade your weapons and increase your chances of survival. With simple mouse control, you can switch between three different weapons, each with their own unique benefits.
Sharpen your reflexes and get ready for an exciting adventure. Good luck in the battle for survival!
